biotools.summary: This server allows to use the BACHSCORE tool with the aim of discriminating the best model of a protein (the native state or a structure very similar to it) among a large set of alternative conformations.

bioschemas.name: BACH Bayesian Analysis Conformation Hunt
bioschemas.summary: This server allows to use the BACHSCORE tool with the aim of discriminating the best model of a protein (the native state or a structure very similar to it) among a large set of alternative conformations.
